custom.typeId: Devices/Distribution Boards/GE DB with PLC PMs

config.expression:
'PLC Type: ' + tag({view.custom.deviceTagPath} + '/Parameters.Description')+', IP: '+ tag({view.custom.deviceTagPath} + '/Parameters.IP Address')+', Mode: '+if (isAvailable (tag ({view.custom.deviceTagPath}+'/PLC Status/Status Folder/Mode Desc')),
tag ({view.custom.deviceTagPath}+'/PLC Status/Status Folder/Mode Desc'),
'NA')

'Time Slot for AMS Main PLC OUC : ' + if (isAvailable (tag ({view.custom.deviceTagPath}+'/OUC/OUC Time Slot')),
tag ({view.custom.deviceTagPath}+'/OUC/OUC Time Slot'),
"NA")

'Moxa Gateway IP: ' + if (isAvailable (tag ({view.custom.deviceTagPath}+'/Power Meter 1/Hostname')),
tag ({view.custom.deviceTagPath}+'/Power Meter 1/Hostname'),
"NA")
